org.usfirst.frc.team3494.robot.subsystems

Class Drivetrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SendableBase
      • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
        • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.PIDSubsystem
          • org.usfirst.frc.team3494.robot.subsystems.Drivetrain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Sendable

    public class Drivetrain
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.PIDSubsystem
    The drive train subsystem. Contains methods for controlling the robot's drive train. Also includes PID angle control via the AHRS mounted to the RoboRIO and PIDSubsystem.

      • TankDrive

        public void TankDrive(double left,
                      double right)
        Drives the drive train tank drive style. The driveTrain will continue to run until stopped with a method like StopDrive().
        Parameters:
        left - The power to drive the left side. Should be a double between -1 and 1.
        right - The power to drive the right side. Should be a double between -1 and 1.

      • VelocityTank

        public void VelocityTank(double left,
                         double right)
        Drives the drive train tank drive style, in velocity mode (encoder edges / decisecond.) The drive train will continue to run until stopped with a method like StopDrive().
        Parameters:
        left - The speed to drive the left side to.
        right - The speed to drive the right side to.

      • StopDrive

        public void StopDrive()
        Stops all drive motors. Does not require re-enabling motors after use.

      • ArcadeDrive

        public void ArcadeDrive(double xSpeed,
                        double zRotation,
                        boolean squaredInputs)
        Arcade drive method for differential drive platform.
        Parameters:
        xSpeed - The robot's speed along the X axis [-1.0..1.0]. Forward is positive.
        zRotation - The robot's rotation rate around the Z axis [-1.0..1.0]. Clockwise is positive.
        squaredInputs - If set, decreases the input sensitivity at low speeds.

      • getSonicDistance

        public double getSonicDistance()
        Returns the distance from a wall as given by the ultrasonic sensor.
        Returns:
        The distance to a wall if the ultrasonic sensor is facing one.

        public double getAverageCounts_Talon()

        Returns:
        The average distance traveled by the drivetrain.

      • getDistanceLeft_Talon

        public double getDistanceLeft_Talon()
        The left drivetrain distance.

      • getAverageDistance_Talon

        public double getAverageDistance_Talon()
        The average drivetrain distance.
        Returns:
        The average number of encoder revolutions.

      • getVelocityLeft

        public double getVelocityLeft()
        Returns:
        The left side velocity, in edges per 100ms (decisecond.)

      • getVelocityRight

        public double getVelocityRight()
        Returns:
        The right side velocity, in edges per 100ms (decisecond.)

      • resetEncoders

        public void resetEncoders()
        Sets the number of encoder edges and revolutions on both sides to zero.

      • GetTrajectoryDuration

        private com.ctre.phoenix.motion.TrajectoryPoint.TrajectoryDuration GetTrajectoryDuration(int durationMs)

      • startFillingLeft

        public void startFillingLeft(double[][] profile,
                             int size)
        Starts filling the motion profile buffer on the left drivetrain Talon SRX. Uses units of feet and feet/sec.
        Parameters:
        profile - The profile to fill the talon with. Should be a list of the form [[point_pos, point_vel, point_timestep], ...].
        size - The number of points in the profile.

      • startFillingRight

        public void startFillingRight(double[][] profile,
                              int size)
        Starts filling the motion profile buffer on the right drivetrain Talon SRX. Uses units of feet and feet/sec.
        Parameters:
        profile - The profile to fill the talon with. Should be a list of the form [[point_pos, point_vel, point_timestep], ...].
        size - The number of points in the profile.

      • leftMpControl

        public void leftMpControl(com.ctre.phoenix.motion.SetValueMotionProfile v)
        Control the drivetrain left side in MotionProfile mode.
        Parameters:
        v - The value to set the left drivetrain at.

      • rightMpControl

        public void rightMpControl(com.ctre.phoenix.motion.SetValueMotionProfile v)
        Control the drivetrain right side in MotionProfile mode.
        Parameters:
        v - The value to set the right drivetrain at.

      • getPidTune

        public double getPidTune()
        Returns the turn value from the drivetrain PID controller. Should be used for driving with ArcadeDrive(double, double, boolean).
        Returns:
        The turn value to use for reaching the PID setpoint.

      • nativeToRPS

        public static double nativeToRPS(double nat)
        Convert native Talon units to revs/second.
        Parameters:
        nat - The value to convert in edges/decisecond.
        Returns:
        The converted value in revolutions/second.

      • rpsToNative

        public static double rpsToNative(double rps)
        Convert revs/second to native Talon units.
        Parameters:
        rps - The value to convert in revs/second.
        Returns:
        The converted value in edges/decisecond.
